text: Kalki is a 2017 Tamil-language short film starring Kishore and Yasmin Ponnappa in the lead roles. The film was directed by Dhilip Kumar and written by film critic Baradwaj Rangan. The film released on 17 May 2017. == Premise == A woman named Kalki (Yasmin Ponnappa) is introduced in the beginning of the film leaving the audience wondering who she is. A scientist, Kishore (Kishore), is on a journey to solve one of the greatest mysteries of the universe. While doing so, he falls in love with Radhika (Yasmin Ponnappa). However, Radhika has a secret that Kishore doesn't know about. == Cast == *Kishore as Kishore *Yasmin Ponnappa as Kalki and Radhika (dual roles) *Mithrabhoomi Saravanan == Release == India Today gave the film three out of five stars and wrote that "In all, Dhilip Kumar's Kalki is an engaging watch for its plot and characters. Actually, the latter!". On the other hand, Firstpost gave the film a rating of two-and-a-half out of five and stated that " Let down by a lack of focus, Kalki meanders through its long runtime, dancing around the themes it should have explored in order to service a mystery that leaves a lot to be desired". == References == Category:Tamil-language Netflix original films Category:Indian films Category:Indian direct-to-video films Category:2017 direct-to-video films
